lead_paragraph: A headline on a report in the Sports Briefing column on Tuesday about Marion Jones, the former track star sentenced to six months in prison for lying to federal agents about her use of performance-enhancing drugs, misidentified the type of application she has submitted to President Bush. It seeks to have her sentence commuted; it does not ask for a pardon.
